website_summaries.verdict: Three-in-one setting spray and oil control also adds a spritz of SPF 50.
pros: Excellent for topping up facial sunscreen without messing up makeup
Works well as a makeup setter, too
Controls oil while protecting the skin from UV ray damage
cons: Slightly sticky consistency is off-putting for some

customer_reviews.title: PROTECTS your skin with no breakouts!
customer_reviews.text: I have combo/oily sensitive skin and I have purchased so many sunscreens for my face that either did not work well or made me break out. I am so happy I found Supergoop! I was skeptical reading the reviews about the product being oily and heavy - I disagree. I usually start my daily facial routine with the Mario Badescu moisturizer with spf 28. I reapply supergoop "over my makeup" throughout the day if I am out and about in the sun. I've used it hiking, swimming and playing tennis! I will be purchasing a second bottle. I live in San Diego so I carry this in my purse everywhere I go! 😆
customer_reviews.author: Khami107

customer_reviews.title: Other claims seem to be false
customer_reviews.text: Come on people really... Once again I’ll never truly take anyone’s review seriously, I’ll try for myself.... this works great! Other review claim Makes hair ruined if gets sprayed: false. Unless you are spraying directly in hair and super close to face which it says SHAKE! And to Mist in circular motion across face 8-10” away from face!!! It worked great The sprayer was claimed to be defective: false. Unless they got a defective item, my sprayer was a mist. And works great! The scent: it smells wonderfully like a suncreen should. and the size is a generous size for a travel or your purse! I use other supergoop products and this one will be another repurchase!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth king

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, Just terrible. Is the one thing I bought this year that gives me buyer's regret. The spray doesn't come out as a fine mist so it is difficult to spray in a correct manner. Makes skin sticky even hours later. And whatever you do, do not let it get in your hair. It clumps up and gives your hair a gritty feeling. What is worse is that this is not an item you can return on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice MIST
customer_reviews.text: Cute packaging! Pros: - The mist function is really a nice mist vs. a spray like others turn out when they claim “mist”. - Light and refreshing with a nice but not too strong scent. Cons: Like others mentioned, if it gets in your hair it makes it stiff. I thought it would be fine if I try to cover my hair with my arm but it still gets it. I will now try to cover my hair with a Towel.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Best sun screen ever!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is fabulous! I used this every day on my face (over my makeup) during 7 days of hot Orlando 95 degree weather. I am 51 and cannot be out in the sun like that without getting brown age spots popping up. Hats tend to make me too hot. This worked perfectly, face didn't even get red at all. As a point of reference went to MI for a couple of days, weather was sunny and 70 degrees, I had ran out of this spray. Came back with an age spot on the side of my nose. Highly recommend to add every day as your sun screen.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M.

customer_reviews.title: Makes you oily!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this because it had SPF in it and I was looking for a setting spray. It was AWFUL!!! Tried it a couple times to make sure it wasn't a user error. It made my skin feel sticky and oily after just applying my makeup, which I've never experienced with any other setting spray. It made my skin feel and look bad, so I stopped using it and tossed it. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Just the Worst
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the sunscreen and for setting makeup because I have a job or I'm in the car most of my day. The spray does not come out fine it Globs out and you can literally see the spray marks on your face. I've done everything it said to do and it's still horrible. It's like when you buy a spray and it gets stuck. And honestly I have gone back to just using spray sunscreen and covering my eyes. I do not recommend this I would use the Urban Decay setting spray and then another form of sunscreen. I would not recommend this to a friend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Smiles

customer_reviews.title: Best for bare skin, no makeup.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this. In theory it sounds so perfect to have as an option but it smelled heavily of alcohol and you have you make sure you eyes are sealed shut or it stings. It made my makeup kind of cake and left a powdery residue that just made my skin/makeup look horrible. I feel this would be best for those who wont be wearing makeup when needing to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Sara D.

customer_reviews.title: Pump stops working
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two bottles of this product. One from a local store and the other from amazon. This is now the second time my pump stops misting. Now when I use the product it does a strong squirt. This forces me to have to use my fingers and spread the product if I chose to use it. I tried to clean the pump spray to see if it was just clogged though that was ineffective. I still have a good amount left in the bottle. I will not purchase this again because of this issue and now wasted product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its Just Okay.
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was super messed up--like the sticker on the outside is wrapped sideways which makes me question if this actually came from Goop or not? Otherwise it's just "okay". I haven't gotten any sunburns while wearing it but I haven't tested it against a full day of sun but it does just find against winter Nebraska sunny days. I don't know that it significantly increases the wear time of my makeup either--seems to be about the same either way so I say this is just "okay".
customer_reviews.author: N. Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Sunscreen is great, the bottle isn't.
customer_reviews.text: The sunscreen itself wasn't the issue. In fact, the sunscreen was fantastic! It sprayed over my makeup, kept it looking fresh, and didn't run down my face and set my makeup in place. It also doesn't sting my eyes like normal spray sunscreen. The downside is that this bottle leaks. I don't know if I had purchased a bottle from a bad batch, but it would leak in my purse, even with the cap on. What a waste of sunscreen. I'll be looking for another spray sunscreen for my face and makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Carmilla Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great product, spray nozzle defective though
customer_reviews.text: Had been using sample sizes of this product and love it so much that I finally decided to splurge and buy the full size. Unfortunately, the spray nozzle keeps getting stuck. I can barely use it and I just opened it. I'm pretty disappointed and I'm not sure if I can get a refund since it's been over a month since I received it (I ordered it before I ran out of the last bottle). Just know that this product is great -- lightweight and helps set makeup but beware of the nozzle. Make sure it works and doesn't get stuck first.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lee

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T SPRAY CORRECTLY & NO RETURNS ACCEPTED!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, i have used it in the past, but this particular bottle doesn't spray correctly, yet, even though it is clearly a defective product, Amazon says this item is not returnable. So basically all of my almost 30$ was wasted. I am very upset about this. I would love to have a bottle that actually works and sprays correctly, but to d that, I guess I have to just start over and spend more money. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Meridyth Griffin

customer_reviews.title: It is what it says - super goopy
customer_reviews.text: This stuff sucks. I sprayed it on my palms first to rub into my face due to warnings that it goops up your hair. Well, it still made the margins of my hair goopy and my face felt caked in sticky goo until I finally washed it off. No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Moran

customer_reviews.title: I will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product after reading about it in a magazine and I am so glad I did. I'm from the time of using baby oil (I used suntan oil 2) to get the darkest tan possible. My skin isn't awful but I do have HIP and I'm trying to prevent it from getting worse. First of all, this spray smells A-M-A-Z-I-N-G, and is a great way to start the day. I spray all over, and it sets my make up while offering protection from the sun. I enjoy using this so much, I actually do use it every day and since the only way sunscreen works is to use it...
customer_reviews.author: DKane

customer_reviews.title: Terrible spray...
customer_reviews.text: Am afraid to use it properly. The spray bottle does not work very well at all! All I get is flat squirt - I think that would be the best way to describe it. Definitely not a fine mist which is what I would expect. The product stings a bit for a second or so, not bad, but would not want it in my eyes. I end up spraying (squirting) into my hand and patting on my face. It does matify but not sure I'm getting the sunscreen coverage that I was looking forward to getting. And for sure not using it every two hours as directed. Quick spray MIST would be so much better.
customer_reviews.author: KG - Charlotte, NC

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your makeup on your face and not sweating off into oblivion.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is really good, it will LOCK your makeup onto your face and keep it there all day. I used this over the summer (in Texas, you know the place that is located about 3 miles north of Hell) for a friend's outdoor afternoon wedding, by a lake. My hair was a frizzy nightmare, but my makeup was FABULOUS and no sunburn, because of the SPF. I would strongly recommend this. My only complain is that the sprayer on my bottle is a little bit messed up, so I had to break it open and pour it into another bottle, but this is my go to setting spray. Just be sure to close your eyes!
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda

customer_reviews.title: Defective Spray Head
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but the spray head is defective. It worked well the first couple of times but after the 4th time, it sprays straight onto my face instead of dispersing onto my face as it should. Now i need to spray it on my hand apply it on my face which is the opposite reason why i bought it in the first place - to not get my hands wet since i need to always wash them. Very disappointed. I want an exchange.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Never could get it to spray properly
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this, but it fell so far short. Perhaps my bottle was defective, but I didn't use it soon enough to exchange it and find out. In any case, the sprayer doesn't work very well. I'll get one tiny little puff of spray out before it starts clogging and coming out in larger droplets or not at all. The coverage is very poor, and I wouldn't trust it for UV protection because of that. Doesn't do much as a setting spray, either, but again - hard to say how it would do if it misted properly. This was the most expensive sunscreen product I've purchased, and definitely a waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mist over makeup!
customer_reviews.text: Love being able to reapply sunscreen over my makeup! Nice fine mist. But if you're going to keep it in your purse, be sure to screw the top on tight. It leaked a little.
customer_reviews.author: KachinaQ

customer_reviews.title: great sunscreen spray for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I have combo, acne prone skin and needed a face sunscreen that wasn't a lotion. This is all natural, vegan and cruelty-free. From the moment I got it, I really liked it. You only need a couple sprays (two or three) to cover your face. It doesn't leave a sticky residue after it's been rubbed in and it didn't break me out. It doesn't smell like sunscreen either, but has a pleasant smell. I don't wear makeup so I can't speak to it's "setting" abilities but it's a lovely sunscreen. I got the smaller version and that's very compact. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Essence

customer_reviews.title: solid product
customer_reviews.text: it smells a little sunscreen-y at first but i don’t mind at all and it doesn’t last longer than a few seconds. it’s super light weight and not sticky. my only complaints are that i wish it sprayed a little more misty and was easier to get on my whole entire face in one mist and i also wish it was a little bigger. however, this little size is perfect for travel!
customer_reviews.author: teesdaleb

customer_reviews.title: Spray isn't a mist
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! After I bought the travel one I had to buy the larger size, however, the dispenser doesn't seem to work. I called for help and I was told to shake for 10 seconds before spraying but it still doesn't spray like a mist. The packaging says its a new dispenser but maybe they should have stuck with the previous one.
customer_reviews.author: 3rdplacemom

customer_reviews.title: Pump release not the best
customer_reviews.text: The product doesn’t release well from the mist over half the time. I have tried both shaking it for a very long time as well as bought 6 different bottles to see if it was just my first two. All did the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Kidionne

customer_reviews.title: Ordering MORE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! So easy to use! Keeps makeup on great. It feels just tiny bit tacky when u touch your face but makeup stays in place great with a matte finish and its a great sunscreen! Just wish it came in a bigger bottle! I'm ordering my second bottle!
customer_reviews.author: zcritter007

customer_reviews.title: The spray nozzle makes this unusable.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if I ever got a full use out of this. If you are lucky you will get one complete spray with the sunscreen misting out. But that is not enough to cover your whole face. Instead, the nozzle gets clogged almost immediately and the rest of the pumps result in small, limpid spittle coming out unevenly. I love the idea but glad I got the travel size to test it out. Even that was not worth the $12 I spend on it.
customer_reviews.author: monkeysan

customer_reviews.title: It's effective as spf and as a setting spray. ...
customer_reviews.text: It's effective as spf and as a setting spray. It smells really minty, but I haven't had any issues with it stinging my eyes. The smell usually lingers for about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Zingarelli

customer_reviews.title: Spray doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this, unfortunately it just didn’t work. Not even once. A complete Waste of money. If your curious, by direct from the company so you can hopefully return without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Roren Tarubetto

customer_reviews.title: It "shoots" at my face
customer_reviews.text: This product smells nice and I am pretty sure it does the work to protect my skin from sun BUT this spray is not "MIST" at all. I try to spray on my face as far as I can however it still "shoots" at my face with a lot of liquid. I like the size that I can put it in my purse and it doesn't take up the space but I wish they can fix the nozzle so then the sunscreen can spread on my face evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Yukoliesh

customer_reviews.title: I threw it in the TRASH
customer_reviews.text: I needed a good facial sunscreen for when I go on my weekend hikes. This is supposed to be a sunscreen mist that is also a setting spray except it leaves your face & hair super greasy & gross as soon as you apply it. I should have read the reviews so now it is in the TRASH.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: My favorite setting spray
customer_reviews.text: I love this because it’s so lightweight, smells heavenly and has spf. I only use a couple sprays but I’m not sure how the spf covers so I wear sunscreen underneath is well. Seems to work great as a setting spray for foundation tho! Eyelids always crease for me still but that’s alright.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing and feels like it works.
customer_reviews.text: The spray feels refreshing. You will feel the product on your face so you know it’s on. I recommend that you pull your hair away from your face when you spray because your hair will feel dirty if the product gets on it.
customer_reviews.author: Travisty

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't squirt
customer_reviews.text: This item is not working- the product will not dispense. I have tried shaking it, wiping the nozzle, and checking for blockages. I can't comment on its effectiveness because I can't use mine. I really wish I could return it but it's not an option. Is mine defective? I would like help.
customer_reviews.author: KimD

customer_reviews.title: Nope nope nope.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted SO BADLY to love this stuff... but I did not. At ALL. It was awful. I tried it without makeup- disaster. I felt gritty and just cakey. With makeup was even worse. And the smell. Have mercy. I have friends who love Supergoop, sadly- this just wasn’t for me.
customer_reviews.author: MBG

customer_reviews.title: Not a mist at all. :(
customer_reviews.text: I'm honestly not sure how it works as a setting spray. I don't wear makeup often and this is the first setting spray I've used. The spray mechanic itself is terrible. :( After I shake well, I make sure to spray into the sink once first because it always does a jet stream at the start (why???) but it still isn't great after. Not a mist at all, that's for sure. If you get too much in one spot it dries badly and you end up with dry white crud on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this product as I was looking for an spf ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product as I was looking for an spf spray to go over my makeup when reapplying throughout the day. The spf makes my face extremely oily which causes my makeup to smear around. I re-tried this about 6 or 7 times because I just really wanted to like it and see the benefits it say it has. Unfortunately, this product just didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Conway

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this sunscreen because it came highly recommended. However, i was disappointed to find that it has a strange smell and that it was oily and sticky. Because it is a spray, I was disappointed by how it made my hair feel super dirty. Definitely would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Antonia Lliteras Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Better SPF sprays exist
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad there are products that help you reapply SPF over makeup. But, there are better SPF sprays out there than this. My face would feel so oily after using this once, let alone multiple times. My makeup would look weird because I used this - so is it really worth it? Other SPF sprays are more expensive but feel less slippery and that difference is important to me. Plus the nozzle on the sprayer gets jammed easily.
customer_reviews.author: R. N.

customer_reviews.title: Great for purse but poor sprayer.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I keep the travel size in my purse and spray it on over my makeup when I get in the car for extra sun protection. The only problem is the sprayer gets stuck down and you have to keep it rinsed off or pull it back up.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Spray bottle doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: My spray bottle does not work right. The first spray was great. But then after that it won't spray unless I clean it out every time. It does not spray evenly. I had always heard great things about the product so I was a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ahdidenhover

customer_reviews.title: Pump sucks!
customer_reviews.text: Going back to the kate product i bought this to replace. Supergoop cant seem to make a pump that works. Plus the oiliness i forgot about. Yuck! Not a good product for combo skin, even if the pump worked. Amazon thankfully good about returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sticky but super convenient
customer_reviews.text: This spray is pretty sticky and definitely leaves your face very shiny - bit its worth it for some very convenient go-anywhere SPF. Coola setting spray is the best there is, and I'm a total sunscreen snob as a fair-skinned redhead with a family history of skin cancer, although it isn't cheap. Both products are cruelty-free, which is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Smells lovely, feels refreshing and does what it says it does
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that makes me give it a 4 rather than 5 is that it is a little sticky. But it's better than rubbing what is probably already a sweaty face with sunscreen and ruining your makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Spray Correctly
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to use as a setting sunscreen spray for everyday use. Worked well the first few times; sprayed large voluminous clouds of sunscreen mist, full-face covering. After the initial full-covering sprays, it doesn't spray well anymore, with still A LOT of product left inside, it squirts out a thin, jet stream of sunscreen -- making it impossible to get full EVEN face coverage to set my makeup look. It's like a little water gun squirt now. Disappointed in the packaging of the product. Good product-bad execution.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Gritty feeling after long day in sun
customer_reviews.text: You have to really shake, as it is not aerosol. After a long day sweating in the hot sun at work, my face did feel gritty. Didn’t look it, but was not the best feeling. But the app works and the container is convenient in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: good if you like your face to be sticky
customer_reviews.text: I believe it helps on the sunscreen side... but it leaves a sticky damp film... tried to cover with powder to make the sticky go away and it gummed up my powder brush.
customer_reviews.author: Mother Mayo

customer_reviews.title: Does have alcohol but it's a super fine mist and it's very light so I can ...
customer_reviews.text: Burns a little on my sensitive skin. Does have alcohol but it's a super fine mist and it's very light so I can overlook the tingle.
customer_reviews.author: Gswizzle

customer_reviews.title: Surprising great setting spray
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally use setting spray but when I saw this in a article recommending, being pale skinned, I like my products to have sun screen in it. I wore all day outside in 89F weather and it stayed very nicely. My face wasn’t melting off and I have oily skin. So it’s easy to do. I was surprised at how well it worked. Looking forward to using this through the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Fitch

customer_reviews.title: So SPF was good, my makeup stayed on
customer_reviews.text: I've used this a few times this summer, mostly because I wanted to have SPF but also wear my normal makeup. I did not get burnt when wearing it but I did feel greasier/shinier. So SPF was good, my makeup stayed on, but it did not really help the oil situation.
customer_reviews.author: L. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. I wear full coverage make up and don't like using cream spf because it changes the color tone of my make up. But this is great becaus I use it as a final step. It sets my makeup leaving my skin soft plus protects from sun.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect makeup setting spray
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect makeup setting spray, and the fact that it has SPF 50 is the icing on the cake. The spray is lightweight and smells fantastically fresh, the size is perfect to pack for trips! Highly recommend, I'll be buying it again once it runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: Finally a sunscreen spray that controls my oil on my ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally a sunscreen spray that controls my oil on my face . After application it sets to matte ( I don't know if i'm allowed to name other brands but I've used very expensive oil control products with no results ) . There is a strong smell of Alcohol for a few seconds when sprayed on . I don't know about this Mist setting the makeup being a guy ,but this is a must have for those with oily or Acne prone skin .
customer_reviews.author: Namgyal Rimpoche

customer_reviews.title: Tiny size and irritated my skin
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this sunscreen, but it was expensive for the tiniest bottle and it irritated my skin. I switched to Supergoop's "Unseen Sunscreen" and I've had much better luck with that product.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Doherty

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this item if you’re wanting a mist or spray.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had of paid more attention to the reviews and not have purchased this product. It does not spray well at all and it’s a total waste of money. Thankfully Amazon did the right thing and offered me a refund as the item cannot be returned due to regulations. It comes out in a pitiful stream/Squirt rather than any semblance of a spray or mist which is what I was hoping for. I would strongly suggest against buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Becky J Lipkin

customer_reviews.title: Not an even spray
customer_reviews.text: This product seemed so great I was really excited to try it however, when I use it it does not spray like a setting spray. It comes out in strong harsh streams that seem to always end up at my eyes. This product does not distribute evenly as a setting spray and I’ve come to throw it away because it’s not doing what I bought it for. What a shame as I was really excited about the concept of this product but the product did not deliver. Would not recommend this particular product.
customer_reviews.author: casey anker

customer_reviews.title: Works well,  but the spray bottle needs work
customer_reviews.text: I love the rosemary smell. Very fresh. But... The spray bottle needs work. A setting spray should come out in an even fine mist, but it kind of splatters out of this bottle. It is a little sticky, but not bad. It does work well, though, as far as DOG, and that's really most important.
customer_reviews.author: ChefShellie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I liked this because I would go on runs at lunch and would need to put sunscreen over my makeup. The only downside is how loud it is when you shake it. But I would def buy again
customer_reviews.author: Taya

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best! I’ve been thinking of a way to keep refreshing my sun protection but not messing up my makeup and this is everything in one bottle! I use it consistently through the day and it definitely helps w oil control. It also smells amazing too! A nice refresher on a hot day!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren D

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Must have for anyone!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Supergoop! This is a quality setting spray that will set my makeup for the whole day. It is just a plus that it has SPF 50. Some days I spray it on even when I'm not wearing makeup because I know I need the SPF protection and also because it smells so good, like minty!
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Conn

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: The alcohol content is so overwhelming that I will not use it on my face again. My makeup rolled off with any pressure such as using my fingertips to put on blush. Going to use this as a body sun spray. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Blonde1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect protection in the perfect travel size.
customer_reviews.text: It's super easy to use, doesn't have much fragrance, and does't make my skin break out. It's small size made it easy for air travel, and it was liked by my teenage grand kids.
customer_reviews.author: Alfymom

customer_reviews.title: SUPER easy to apply - shake and spray
customer_reviews.text: SUPER easy to apply - shake and spray. Love the ease of this product. Doesnt feel heavy or sticky on my face. Highly recommend. Have not used as a makeup setter yet, but I think it would work just as great.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs this product!
customer_reviews.text: I just LOVE everything about this. It has the right amount of SPF, it smells SO wonderful, and it is a great setting spray! The only complaint I have is that I did not buy the full size along with the travel size!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Petric

customer_reviews.title: My old sun screen gave me an allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect to replace the previous face sunscreen I tried which gave me an awful allergic reaction. This has been wonderful on my sensitive skin and I plan to order more for my trip down to Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Böhl Family

customer_reviews.title: Good spritzer, good protection
customer_reviews.text: Good spritzer, good protection, I have neutral skin and I’m not picky about shine or actual makeup setting. I like that you can reapply sunscreen throughout the day in a easy, sanitary way
customer_reviews.author: Jaynee

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Has a matting effect which is a relief. Can irritate eyes if not careful but it has been a great improvement over shiny heavy sun creams. I'm dark skinned.
customer_reviews.author: Miss C!

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best product ever! Love this, I carry one in my school bag and one other in my purse. It’s refreshing and effective. The first time I used it, it stung a bit. Avoid the eye area! Other than that, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Superon

customer_reviews.title: Burns on application and I don't have sensitive skin. ...
customer_reviews.text: Burns on application and I don't have sensitive skin. The sprayer also clogged by third use, so now it's difficult to dispense. This product is not worth the money.

product_meta.title: Supergoop! Defense Refresh (Re) setting Mist SPF 50, 3.4 fl oz - Makeup Setting Spray & Face Sunscreen for Sensitive Skin with Rosemary & Peppermint Extract; Light, refreshing scent
product_meta.description:
Size:Refresh Setting Mist 3.4 Fl OzDefense refresh setting mist spf 50 is a unique three-in-one weightless mist that sets make-up, helps control oil and shine and refreshes your defense against photo aging uv rays. With antioxidant-rich rosemary and mint to help improve skin’s complexion and deliver an invigorating essence, this is your perfect pick-me-up for fresh, flawless, sun-safe skin throughout the day. Directions: Shake! Shake! Shake! Shake well before each use! “Super” shaking balls inside bottle will mix the bi-phase formula and provide even distribution of make-up setting and UV protecting ingredients. Pull hair back, close eyes, tuck in lips, and spray 7-10 times in a circle from 8-10" away. Keep eyes closed for about 3 seconds after application and you’re “set”! Remember to refresh and reapply frequently throughout the day. Water resistant up to 40 minutes.

BRAND STORY
Supergoop! recognizes that traditional sunscreen is the farthest thing from “feels good”. So, we strive to create products formulated with only the highest quality ingredients, always free from any controversial ones.
feature_bullets: EASILY REAPPLY YOUR SPF - This makeup finishing spray is a unique, three-in-one, weightless facial mist that makes it easy to reapply your SPF on-the-go.
SET YOUR MAKEUP - This feel-good formula sets your makeup & helps control oil & shine while refreshing your defense against both UVA & UVB rays.
INCREDIBLE TEXTURE - Our sunscreen setting spray has a gentle texture & a light, refreshing scent; its natural finish is great for all skin types.
BEST-IN-CLASS INGREDIENTS - Defense Refresh absorbs easily & contains soothing, antioxidant-rich ingredients like peppermint & rosemary extracts to nourish & protect skin.

HOW TO APPLY - Shake well, then pull hair back, close eyes, tuck in lips, & spray generously & evenly in a circle from 8-10" away. Remember to refresh & reapply frequently throughout the day, at least every 2 hours.
